lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Of course. Now if you could please leave the room for like 15 minutes, I'll get right on the case.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: I just need time to focus. I need as much quiet as possible to initiate my WONDER ZONE.

lines.name: Tai
lines.text: You mean that thing where you pose and get really quiet?

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Yeah that! Just gimme a moment.

lines.name: Locke
lines.text: Accessing the WONDER ZONE: FULL DIVE. START!
